Text:
No longer healthy for the Wii video game, no more sports, no more arguments innocent, the Nintendo Wii now has the first game risque (and pretty), with which your house can become the dream of every single. 

We Dare is the name of this curious game in which up to 2 couples may participate in many different mini-games, ranging from the popular game of the apple, until lap dances. 


As you can see, the Nintendo Wii has gone from playing tennis spanking in less than anyone had imagined. Clearly, if you are at least a little jealous, this game will not be suitable for you (much less for your partner.) On the other hand, can be a great way to end the night if you are at home with a friend and two other friends. 

With 40 different games, grouped in various levels ranging from adventure and intelligence to the seduction and the tone actually spent. 

A great idea for couples swingers for singles, for which she is home alone with 3 friends, but not for the user with a girlfriend and no desire to see how another man gives a lap dance. 

Fortunately for those who have a partner, there is the obvious solution to purchase only two controls (if you have 4 controllers, then two should be hidden where nobody can find them), or to buy the PS3 version, which can only play for 2 people. 

If you live somewhere that is not framed within the European continent, then do not get your hopes up, as this dirty game will be released only on European territory and for now, no information to indicate otherwise. 

At the end you leave a video for that you get to know it all about, and watch the finish, which brings a very good surprise.
